messages.subject: tapes from HSC conference
messages.msgSnippet: I ll have some of my own and mine with Richard Prystowsky available for sale in person in South Carolina this weekend. een http://www.hsc.org/tapes2002.html
messages.messageBody:
I'll have some of my own and mine with Richard Prystowsky available for sale
in person in South Carolina this weekend.

een http://www.hsc.org/tapes2002.html

The number after the tape is the identifier, so include that if you order.

It looks better on the website (address above) but here's a data dump:

tapes, 3-6 $3.25, 7-15 $ 3.75

Or check the box by the title and list quantity if more than one (example 2
each)
Please circle tape requested, indicate quantity needed & include payment with
order.
